APPENDIX A
ANALYSIS OF NAEB MEMBERSHIP
Summary of Membership as of January 1, 1957:
Active Members
120

85

77

3
Individual Members
(former AERT and new)
510
Total
795"

12

30

6

Total Active Membership 120 (l)
(1) Due to operation of more than one station (radio and/or television) these
120 members operate, or have construction permits for, 152 stations,
(2) NOTE: In October all AERT members in good standing became individual
members of the NAEB. At the same time all individuals who held affiliate
memberships were changed to individual members, the affiliate category
1957
